name: IBM Cloud Private ELK Integration - Other
description: This integration template installs Filebeat on a deployed VM and registers it with the IBM Cloud Private ELK stack

metadata.displayName: IBM Cloud Private ELK Integration - Other
metadata.longDescription: This integration template installs Filebeat on a deployed VM and registers it with the IBM Cloud Private ELK stack

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description: The IBM Cloud Private ELK does not support receiving logs from external sources by default. See the documentation for how to enable this.
